thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 18 of 288
thread.title: Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text: We use HelloFresh as our dining out at home option! The recipes are restaurant quality, but you make it at home! My husband and I enjoy a nice gourmet dinner at home together now instead of sitting in a noisy, crowded restaurant. The portions are filling, there is a bit more prep work then I am use to but I like how everything is made fresh right down to the salad dressing. The customer service is great, once a veggie wasn't the freshest and I let them know and and I was compensated for the inconvenience. We are enjoying HelloFresh!
